name: Assaryth
description: After putting in hundreds of hours of painstaking work during the summer, I got a little burned out of making wads. Coming back this fall, I've taken a new approach -- making wads should be as easy and fun as playing them. So to that end I have been selective about where I put in loads of detail and why. This is a free-form map with lots of flow and connectivity. Hope you guys have fun with it. :)
